Chinese.Description: 主动触发buff且玩家手中仍有空位时，会给予玩家一个只能在本轮回使用的信标，投出后若上方没有遮挡则会在落地时激活轨道炮。轨道炮会自动锁定附近最大的目标并攻击。冷却240秒

English.Description: When triggered , if slugcat has an open hand grants slugcat a special beacon. When thrown, if there is no ceiling above it, calls down an orbital strike which targets nearby creatures. 4 minute cooldown.
